verses.name: 1 Kings 8:26
verses.text: And now, O God of Israel, let thy word, I pray thee, be verified, which thou spakest unto thy servant David my father.

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:27
verses.text: But will God indeed dwell on the earth? behold, the heaven and heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house that I have builded?

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:28
verses.text: Yet have thou respect unto the prayer of thy servant, and to his supplication, O Lord my God, to hearken unto the cry and to the prayer, which thy servant prayeth before thee to day:
